fomod.Name: Estrus Chaurus Spider Addon V3.94 Addon V3
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Requirements: Estrus Chaurus+ v3.94+ and its prerequisites http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1033-estrus-chaurus/ (optionally) NiOverride http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37481/?
This is a port of http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1938-estrus-chaurus-v394-spider-addon/ It's not a replacer but an addon, so it is compatible with EC+ v4.20a and, maybe, future versions.
This mod changes breeder effect of EstrusChaurus.esp by adding HasSpell check it so that you can only get pregnant by either a spider or a chaurus at a time. Scripts are form version v3.94, with a minor tweaks and body scaling set to NiO.
